pt.ua.dicoogle.sdk.settings.server

Interface ServerSettingsReader

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ServerSettings
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LegacyServerSettings, ServerSettingsImpl

    public interface ServerSettingsReader
    A read-only interface for accessing server settings. When requesting the server's settings from a plugin, an instance with this API is returned. Plugins should not implement this interface.
    Author:
    Eduardo Pinho
